mentionedBy.name: PTC Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: ENOVIA offers 3D product architect tool for multi-CAD product structures using 3D Experience platform. CATIA is enterprise CAD for advanced assemblies and regulatory requirements. CATIA + ENOVIA provides deep native integration.
